The premier will chair another panel on raising the speed limits on divided highways to 120 km/h and then preemptively test the theory on select highways . articles.title: Nearby super-Earth may be our best chance yet to find alien life
articles.description: A newly detected super-Earth just 20 light-years away is giving scientists one of the most promising chances yet to search for life beyond our solar system. articles.title: Wild new “gyromorph” materials could make computers insanely fast
articles.description: Researchers engineered “gyromorphs,” a new type of metamaterial that combines liquid-like randomness with large-scale structural patterns to block light from every direction. articles.title: Nectar wars between bumble bees and invasive ants drain the hive

articles.title: Enthusiastic cyclists gearing up for another Ottawa winter
